confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the data in ${name}?
getTab: Print all opened custom tabs in the log
name: Siyuan

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the official tutorial to make sure you understand the plug-in. Basic development process.

hintDesc:
If you like this plugin, you can give it a star or a reward on GitHub
1. Applicable scenarios: sharing documents to the public network.
2. Release nature: static documents (will not change with the changes of Siyuan Notes documents)
3. Version nature: stable version
4. Supported front-ends: desktop, desktop browser
5. Support back-end: macos, windows, linux, docker
6. Source code: Plug-in, Server (supports docker one-click building)
7. The settings of "Regenerate Link", "Page Width", "Navigation Menu", and "Header Image Height" are only saved locally, not on the server. They will only take effect the next time you share the document.
8. WeChat: uBpHJlVdn5k15G3dhLh1
9. Cache directory location: Siyuan Data Folder/tmp/plugin/share-note (Note: The folder is automatically cleaned before each export)
10. When you switch from the old public server (http://124.223.15.220) to the new one (https://share.acer.red:25934), the previously shared pages will not be retained, and you need to share them again.
menu_address_desc: The default value is https://share.acer.red:25934, which supports docker one-click build
menu_server_token_desc: Used to allow access to the server. If the server has a token set, you need to enter it here. The public default server does not require a token. If you use your own server, it is recommended to set one. Requires server version 2.4.5 or above.
menu_delete_share_desc: Delete the shared link and related resource files.
menu_create_share_desc: After sharing, update whenever the document content or style is changed. Do not click this button multiple times.
menu_copy_link_full_desc: Copies document title, sharing link and access code (if set)
menu_open_page_manager_desc: View and manage (delete, enable/disable) the current app's shared documents
menu_access_key_desc: Users will need to input this key to see the shared document. It will be automatically generated when "Require viewing key" is enabled.
menu_access_key_enable_title_desc: This feature is disabled when the page is not shared.
menu_exist_link_create_desc: Enable to regenerate the link when uploading an article if it already exists
menu_mini_menu_desc: After startup, a navigation menu is generated on the left side of the generated sharing page, which is used to jump to the 1st to 6th level titles. (Not optimized for mobile)
menu_hide_version_desc: Hide the SiYuan version number from exported pages
menu_title_image_height_desc: The unit is CSS vh (relative height). When set to 0, it means the header is hidden; 30-50 is recommended. If there is no header image on the page, this parameter is invalid.
menu_page_wide_desc: Set the exported page width, supporting two units: px and %, such as 800px or 90%
menu_custom_css_desc: This setting applies to the entire application, not just the current page. If the input is empty, no custom CSS is applied. Fill in the example body{...}
err_upload: Upload failed, please check from the console or contact the author
err_network: Network error, please check the network
menu_home_page_desc: Set the current document as the homepage. This option is only valid when the server is used for personal use. Only one homepage document can be set.
result_intput_percentage: Please enter a valid percentage, such as 100% or 0%
result_intput_pixel: Please enter a valid pixel value, such as 800px
result_error_token: Authentication failed, please reset the token
new_server: The public server currently used by this plugin is http://124.223.15.220. This server will be discontinued on January 6, 2025. The plugin author currently provides a new, free server address (https://share.acer.red:25934). It is recommended that you use the new server address in the plugin settings.
